verses.verse: These <WH428> are the journeys <WH4550> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> went <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with their armies <WH6635> under the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> and Aaron. <WH175>

And Moses <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> their goings <WH4161> out according to their journeys <WH4550> by the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD: <WH3068> and these <WH428> are their journeys <WH4550> according to their goings <WH4161> out.

And they departed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486> in the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> on <WH5921> the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month; <WH2320> on <WH5921> the morrow <WH4283> after the passover <WH6453> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH3318> out with an high <WH7311> hand <WH3027> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> the Egyptians. <WH4714>

For the Egyptians <WH4714> buried <WH6912> all <WH3605> their firstborn, <WH1060> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had smitten <WH5221> among them: on their gods <WH430> also the LORD <WH3068> executed <WH6213> judgments. <WH8201>
And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> removed <WH5265> from Rameses, <WH7486> and pitched <WH2583> in Succoth. <WH5523>
And they departed <WH5265> from Succoth, <WH5523> and pitched <WH2583> in Etham, <WH864> which <WH834> is in the edge <WH7097> of the wilderness. <WH4057>

And they removed <WH5265> from Etham, <WH864> and turned <WH7725> again <WH7725> to Pihahiroth, <WH6367> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Baalzephon: <WH1189> and they pitched <WH2583> before <WH6440> Migdol. <WH4024>

And they departed <WH5265> from before <WH6440> Pihahiroth, <WH6367> and passed <WH5674> through <WH8432> the middle <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> into the wilderness, <WH4057> and went <WH3212> three <WH7969> days' <WH3117> journey <WH1870> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Etham, <WH864> and pitched <WH2583> in Marah. <WH4785>

And they removed <WH5265> from Marah, <WH4785> and came <WH935> to Elim: <WH362> and in Elim <WH362> were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> fountains <WH5869> of water, <WH4325> and three score <WH7657> and ten palm <WH8558> trees; and they pitched <WH2583> there. <WH8033>
And they removed <WH5265> from Elim, <WH362> and encamped <WH2583> by the Red <WH5488> sea. <WH3220>
And they removed <WH5265> from the Red <WH5488> sea, <WH3220> and encamped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin. <WH5512>
And they took <WH5265> their journey <WH5265> out of the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin, <WH5512> and encamped <WH2583> in Dophkah. <WH1850>
And they departed <WH5265> from Dophkah, <WH1850> and encamped <WH2583> in Alush. <WH442>
And they removed <WH5265> from Alush, <WH442> and encamped <WH2583> at Rephidim, <WH7508> where <WH8033> was no <WH3808> water <WH4325> for the people <WH5971> to drink. <WH8354>
And they departed <WH5265> from Rephidim, <WH7508> and pitched <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>
And they removed <WH5265> from the desert <WH4057> of Sinai, <WH5514> and pitched <WH2583> at Kibrothhattaavah. <WH6914>
And they departed <WH5265> from Kibrothhattaavah, <WH6914> and encamped <WH2583> at Hazeroth. <WH2698>
And they departed <WH5265> from Hazeroth, <WH2698> and pitched <WH2583> in Rithmah. <WH7575>
And they departed <WH5265> from Rithmah, <WH7575> and pitched <WH2583> at Rimmonparez. <WH7428>
And they departed <WH5265> from Rimmonparez, <WH7428> and pitched <WH2583> in Libnah. <WH3841>
And they removed <WH5265> from Libnah, <WH3841> and pitched <WH2583> at Rissah. <WH7446>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rissah, <WH7446> and pitched <WH2583> in Kehelathah. <WH6954>
And they went <WH5265> from Kehelathah, <WH6954> and pitched <WH2583> in mount <WH2022> Shapher. <WH8234>
And they removed <WH5265> from mount <WH2022> Shapher, <WH8234> and encamped <WH2583> in Haradah. <WH2732>
And they removed <WH5265> from Haradah, <WH2732> and pitched <WH2583> in Makheloth. <WH4722>
And they removed <WH5265> from Makheloth, <WH4722> and encamped <WH2583> at Tahath. <WH8480>
And they departed <WH5265> from Tahath, <WH8480> and pitched <WH2583> at Tarah. <WH8646>
And they removed <WH5265> from Tarah, <WH8646> and pitched <WH2583> in Mithcah. <WH4989>
And they went <WH5265> from Mithcah, <WH4989> and pitched <WH2583> in Hashmonah. <WH2832>
And they departed <WH5265> from Hashmonah, <WH2832> and encamped <WH2583> at Moseroth. <WH4149>
And they departed <WH5265> from Moseroth, <WH4149> and pitched <WH2583> in Benejaakan. <WH1142>
And they removed <WH5265> from Benejaakan, <WH1142> and encamped <WH2583> at Horhagidgad. <WH2735>
And they went <WH5265> from Horhagidgad, <WH2735> and pitched <WH2583> in Jotbathah. <WH3193>
And they removed <WH5265> from Jotbathah, <WH3193> and encamped <WH2583> at Ebronah. <WH5684>
And they departed <WH5265> from Ebronah, <WH5684> and encamped <WH2583> at Eziongaber. <WH6100>
And they removed <WH5265> from Eziongaber, <WH6100> and pitched <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin, <WH6790> which <WH1958> is Kadesh. <WH6946>
And they removed <WH5265> from Kadesh, <WH6946> and pitched <WH2583> in mount <WH2022> Hor, <WH2023> in the edge <WH7097> of the land <WH776> of Edom. <WH123>

And Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> went <WH5927> up into <WH413> mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> at <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD, <WH3068> and died <WH4191> there, <WH8033> in the fortieth <WH705> year <WH8141> after the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were come <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> in the first <WH259> day of the fifth <WH2549> month. <WH2320>
And Aaron <WH175> was an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he died <WH4194> in mount <WH2022> Hor. <WH2023>

And king <WH4428> Arad <WH6166> the Canaanite, <WH3669> which <WH1931> dwelled <WH3427> in the south <WH5045> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> heard <WH8085> of the coming <WH935> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
And they departed <WH5265> from mount <WH2022> Hor, <WH2023> and pitched <WH2583> in Zalmonah. <WH6758>
And they departed <WH5265> from Zalmonah, <WH6758> and pitched <WH2583> in Punon. <WH6325>
And they departed <WH5265> from Punon, <WH6325> and pitched <WH2583> in Oboth. <WH88>
And they departed <WH5265> from Oboth, <WH88> and pitched <WH2583> in Ijeabarim, <WH5863> in the border <WH1366> of Moab. <WH4124>
And they departed <WH5265> from Iim, <WH5864> and pitched <WH2583> in Dibongad. <WH1769>
And they removed <WH5265> from Dibongad, <WH1769> and encamped <WH2583> in Almondiblathaim. <WH5963>
And they removed <WH5265> from Almondiblathaim, <WH5963> and pitched <WH2583> in the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim, <WH5682> before <WH6440> Nebo. <WH5015>
And they departed <WH5265> from the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim, <WH5682> and pitched <WH2583> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho. <WH3405>
And they pitched <WH2583> by Jordan, <WH3383> from Bethjesimoth <WH1020> even to Abelshittim <WH63> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab. <WH4124>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho, <WH3405> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, When <WH3588> you are passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> into <WH413> the land <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3667>

Then you shall drive <WH3423> out all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you, and destroy <WH6> all <WH3605> their pictures, <WH4906> and destroy <WH6> all <WH3605> their molten <WH4541> images, and quite pluck <WH8045> down <WH8045> all <WH3605> their high <WH1116> places:
And you shall dispossess <WH3423> the inhabitants of the land, <WH776> and dwell <WH3427> therein: for I have given <WH5414> you the land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it.

And you shall divide <WH5157> the land <WH776> by lot <WH1486> for an inheritance <WH5157> among your families: <WH4940> and to the more <WH7227> you shall give the more <WH7235> inheritance, <WH5159> and to the fewer <WH4592> you shall give the less <WH4591> inheritance: <WH5159> every man's inheritance shall be in the place where <WH413> his lot <WH1486> falls; <WH3318> according to the tribes <WH4294> of your fathers <WH1> you shall inherit. <WH5157>

But if <WH518> you will not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you; then it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that those which <WH834> you let remain <WH3498> of them shall be pricks <WH7899> in your eyes, <WH5869> and thorns <WH6796> in your sides, <WH6654> and shall vex <WH6887> you in the land <WH776> wherein <WH834> you dwell. <WH3427>
Moreover it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that I shall do <WH6213> to you, as I thought <WH1819> to do <WH6213> to them.
